channel.title: 0/1 prayer assigned to new character profiles
channel.description: I'm using a blank source and client and instead of assigning 1/1 prayer it assigns 0/1, and because of that items cannot be equipped, I've found that editing it to 1/1 fixes it, but I don't want to have to do this to all new profiles, how do I i make it so it assigns 1/1 to all new profiles?

item.title: 0/1 prayer assigned to new character profiles
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

I’m using a blank source and client and instead of assigning 1/1 prayer it assigns 0/1, and because of that items cannot be equipped, I’ve found that editing it to 1/1 fixes it, but I don’t want to have to do this to all new profiles, how do I i make it so it assigns 1/1 to all new profiles?
